review:
*** ** *** **** ****** * **** ***** ** ** ** **** **** ** ****** *******. Very helpfully, polite behaviour, ha has been listened patients problems very carefully. First of all listen the problems first, next, noted down and finally give you suggestions, Medicine or advice, the most important things is that, he has explain what ever you have and He will teach you everything what you have and what will need to be done for your recovery. This is my personal opinion. I'm suffer abdominal pain in the last 1year, before sujoy sir, i have meet 3 GASTROENTEROLOGY surgeon but nobody found the problem, but on the first day when i meet with sujoy sir he had tell me everything and right now I'm 80% recovered, i have some serious issues that's why I need to take the medicine a long period.
Thank you so much sir for Me and my Mom🙏 🙏 🙏

I had visited the hospital and it was health problem related to vitamin D deficiency. ****** *** **** ***** I am satisfied with the treatment given. Medicine was prescribed by the doctor. There was waiting time in the hospital. Hospitality was good in terms of cleanliness. I am not able to visit the doctor due to lock down.

My mother visited along with my sister as they both needed a check up... He suggested a newly launched medicine which is not even available in the market and didn't even provide a substitute(not sure what was the reason) 
He shouted on my sister even after knowing the fact that she is a hypertension patient herself.
Is this really what you are supposed to do? 
**** ***** ***** ***** **** ****** **** ******** * **** ***** **** * ****** ** ********* **** **** *** * **** ** ********* * ******** ******** **** ***** ** ******* **** **** I would suggest that people think twice before visiting * ******* **** ****

I had been to hospital and it was for health issue related to fever. ****** *** ******** Medicine was prescribed by the doctor.  Blood test and scanning was done. I am satisfied with the treatment given. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. There was waiting time in the hospital.  I am good now and recovered. Hospitality was good.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Sujoy was incredibly friendly, patient, knowledgeable and understanding. I knew he really cared about me. All of my questions and concerns were answered. It was a perfect experience. Thank you so much, Dr. Sujoy.
